Name: Cricket 22 - Academy Creation Tools
About the game: Get ready for Cricket 22 with the incredible Cricket 22 - Academy Creation Tools. Through this, give yourself a head start by creating all your players, teams and much more! Creation features include: Players. Create your likeness within Big Ant’s celebrated in-depth creation tools. Teams. Create your ultimate squad – drop your entire local cricket teammates into the game. Uniforms and logos. Got your own emblem you want to see in your career mode? Create those visual elements here! Best of all, anything you create with the Tools can be uploaded to the Big Ant servers. Meaning you’ll be able to share and download all of your creations with the world.
